description: This file defines the `Recipe` class which models a recipe entity with properties like id, title, description, imageUrl, ingredients, instructions, and rating. It provides methods for copying instances and equality comparison.

classes.name: Recipe
classes.description: A class representing a recipe with properties such as id, title, description, image URL, ingredients list, instructions list, and rating.

methods.name: Recipe
methods.description: Constructor for creating a immutable Recipe instance with required fields and default rating.

methods.name: copyWith
methods.description: Creates a copy of the Recipe instance, optionally replacing specified fields.
